text: White Mexicans () are Mexicans of total or predominantly European or West Asian ancestry. Many come from Spanish people because Mexico was colonized by Spain for many years. White Mexicans range from 29% to 49% of the total mexican population according to survyes that use as reference skin color and they are predominant in the northern and western regions. They appear a lot on Mexican television and movies. They are Mexicans because it is their nationality. == References == Category:Mexican people
title: White Mexicans
